item.description:
People in the Connecticut group suggested a hiking day, I picked the first Saturday in October, maybe we can meet at Arcadia in RI. It's a big wildlife area with lots of hiking trails and ponds. Bring the kids and dogs and we'll enjoy some nature. We can change the date and place if needed, this was the first thing that popped into my head.

Brian

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Atheist Hiking Day
